actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Mark Twain National Forest, Missouri, which comprise about 17,562 acres, and known as the "Irish Wilderness," as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System.

summary.text: Irish Wilderness Act - Designates specified lands in the Mark Twain National Forest, Missouri, as the Irish Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Mark Twain National Forest, Missouri, which comprise about 17,562 acres, and known as the "Irish Wilderness," as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System.
